name: fider
description: Fider is an open-source feedback collection platform that allows users to submit ideas, vote, and comment. It is designed for product development teams and communities to gather and organize user feedback in a transparent way.
features: Feedback Collection: User idea submissions, Voting system, Comment threads. Transparent product development.
Community Engagement: Public feedback boards. User-driven priorities.
Organization: Tag and categorize feedback. Structured insights.
Product Teams: Built for development workflows. Actionable feedback management.
Status Tracking: Mark ideas as planned or completed. Clear communication.
Moderation: Control submissions and comments. Quality management.
Authentication: SSO and OAuth support. Secure access.
Notifications: Email updates on activity. Stay informed.
Custom Branding: White-label interface. Your brand.
Multi-Tenant: Support multiple boards. Scalable solution.
